Stanford: Stanford University is a private research university in Stanford, California, adjacent to Palo Alto and between San Jose and San Francisco. Its 8,180-acre campus is one of the largest in the United States. Stanford's undergraduate program is the most selective in America. Due to its academic strength, wealth, and proximity to Silicon Valley it is often cited as one of the world's most prestigious universities.
CSS: CSS stands for cascading style sheets. It's used to change the look and feel of a web page.
JavaScript: JavaScript is a programming language used to provide interactivity to web pages in web browsers and create dynamic websites on the server side.
